title: (x) WomensBiz.us - Franklin Gothic {Mark S, James, Franz}
content:
Anybody know what font this is? ![Womens Biz](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060436im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/36333.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Starsky and Hutch rainbow shirt - ITC Bookman Swash {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060436/http:/www.typophile.com/node/4817 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Bembo-like typeface - HTF Requiem {Addison, Mark S} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060436/http:/www.typophile.com/node/4845 "Go to next forum topic")
author: popinfresh

comments.content: I think it's just [Franklin Gothic Extra Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060436/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/franklin-gothic/extra-condensed/testdrive.html?s=womensBiz&p=72), but they reduced the B to lowercase size and removed the dot from the i.
It looks like Franklin Gothic Bold Condensed with psuedosmallcaps.
Hm, this probably started out as Franklin Gothic.. Trying out something now..
ah nuts. Too late and a dollar short!
